name: Colorpillar
description:
Returning to your childhood home for the first time in several years, you get nostalgic over the various items which you can interact with. The first object you interact with shapes your whole perspective of how you view your nostalgia and memories of your old house. 

This was my final project for the Fall 2021 Color Dynamics class which I took at Fitchburg State University, where I had to make a project based on color using any medium available.  I wanted to create a short, but polished project visually depicting the effects of nostalgia on an individual through the usage of color. 

This project means a lot to me, as I have been dealing with nostalgia for the past year and a half, so I appreciate it if you could check it out and provide feedback on it! :)
